title: Redis Launches Native Vector Support
content: Redis has added native vector search capabilities to better support AI workloads.

title: OpenAI Releases GPT-4 Turbo
content: OpenAI has released GPT-4 Turbo, a cheaper and faster variant of GPT-4 optimized for inference.

title: Meta Open Sources LLaMA 3
content: Meta has open-sourced LLaMA 3, its most powerful open model yet for natural language understanding.
